name: GBTK5-Merchant And Demon-lite
description:
Submission for https://itch.io/jam/game-breakers-toolkit-jam-5 

Welcome Merchant. A greedy demon wants you to repay your debt.

Pay or don't pay, it is up to you.

This game is my first entry into Game Breaker's Toolkit (GBTK) Game Jam.

Theme for this game is "You know what to do", so, as such, there's no tutorial here.

I had fun making this and testing it, so I hope you have fun playing it. The game has 4 endings, 2 secret and 2 normal. So, have fun, let me know what you think.
